metadata.description: Relationship 'staff' and all reports and report views.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The age range for the person

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `person+birth_date` IS NULL THEN '?' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 17 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '-18' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 23 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '18-23' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 29 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '24-29' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 34 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 39 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 44 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 49 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 54 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 59 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_ADD( `person+birth_date`, INTERVAL 64 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '60-64' ELSE '65+' END

configuration.value: A list of all current staff
